body:
So, I freely admit I could have done something wrong, but...

I just did a git pull upstream develop

and am now trying to re-install a package that I have installed many times this week with mpi and now all of the sudden I am getting openmpi installed too. If I am reading graph output correctly, its comming from hdf5?

title: Updated to newest develop and now am getting openmpi dependence
